group_1.textRight: Thanks for waiting, Sakurako! I was able to@buy a picture diary!
I'm sorry...for making you come along with@me on such short notice.
I meant to buy this before the summer@vacation started, but I forgot...

group_1.textLeft: | No, I'm happy to shop with you, too. |

group_1.textRight: Hee hee, that's summer vacation memory@number one.
Yeah!
I have plans with Touka and Nemu, but...
I want to make summer memories with Sis@and everyone at Mikazuki Villa, too.
...Oh! Look, Sakurako!
There's a special section with an aquarium@exhibit!

group_1.textLeft: | Aquarium...? Would you like to see it? |

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
[chara:101501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wow...

group_1.textLeft: (A water tank filled with brightly colored fish@and decorations...)
| ...Do you like this kind of thing, Ui? |

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
...It's a little bit like a dream.
I was thinking how wonderful it would be to@swim with the fish...
In a beautiful place like an aquarium.

group_1.textLeft: | Swimming with fish in an aquarium... |

group_1.textRight: Hee hee, isn't it like a fairy tale?
Ummm...like Urashima Taro!
...It's about a man who rescues a turtle and gets@invited to an undersea Dragon Palace by a princess.
And they lived happily ever after.
Do you want to go to a bookstore and check if@they have a picture book?

group_1.textLeft: | No, I'll ask Nemu and Touka later, so it's fine. |

group_1.textRight: I see.
...*Giggle*@I'd like to go to the Dragon Palace too.

group_1.textLeft: | ...Would it make Iroha and the others happy@if we could go to the Dragon Palace? |

group_1.textRight: They'd definitely be happy!
Sis, Touka, Nemu, and everyone else at@Mikazuki Villa.
If we could play together in a beautiful place,@it would make for a very fun memory.

group_1.textLeft: | An aquarium...where you can swim with fish@at the Dragon Palace... |
